title: Task 85

question.text: What is the relationship between behavioral biometrics and typing patterns based on the dialogue?

answers.feedback: The dialogue suggests a connection between behavioral biometrics and typing patterns.

answers.answer: Behavioral biometrics is the same as typing patterns.
answers.feedback: While related, behavioral biometrics encompasses more than just typing patterns.

answers.answer: Typing patterns are a part of behavioral biometrics.
Palm vein recognition excludes the study of typing patterns.
answers.feedback: Palm vein recognition is mentioned separately and doesn't exclude the study of typing patterns in behavioral biometrics.

dialogue.text: For example, they're experimenting with palm vein recognition and even behavioral biometrics, like typing patterns to enhance security.

description: Typing patterns refers to the unique way you type on a keyboard or device. It includes the speed, rhythm, and specific patterns you use when pressing keys. Each person has their own distinct way of typing.
